form.label: Session Details
form.searchTemplate: `xd_index` sourcetype="xendesktop:*:session" earliest=$date$:00:00:00 latest=$date$:23:59:59 | bin _time span=1h | eval hour=strftime(_time, "%H") | table UserName MachineName SessionKey StartTime _time hour

chart.searchPostProcess: stats dc(UserName) AS Sessions by hour | sort hour | rename hour AS Hour
chart.title: Session Count by Hour

table.title: Session Details
table.searchPostProcess: stats latest(_time) AS CurrentTime by StartTime SessionKey MachineName UserName | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %Z" mktime(CurrentTime) mktime(StartTime) | eval SessionDuration = tostring(CurrentTime - StartTime, "duration") | eval "Log on Time" = strftime(StartTime, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") | table UserName "Log on Time" MachineName SessionKey SessionDuration StartTime CurrentTime | rename UserName AS "User Name" MachineName AS "Machine Name" SessionKey AS "Session Key" SessionDuration AS "Session Duration"
